titles.title: Congratulating the Adrian College Bulldogs men's hockey team for winning the Midwest Collegiate Hockey Association regular season title and postseason tournament and for having the best first year win-loss record in Division III history.

Congratulating the Adrian College Bulldogs men's hockey team for winning the Midwest Collegiate Hockey Association regular season title and postseason tournament and for having the best first year win-loss record in Division III history.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Mr. Andrews asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
Committee on Education and Labor discharged.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Congratulates the Adrian College Bulldogs men's hockey team for winning the Midwest Collegiate Hockey Association regular season title and post-season tournament and for having the best first year win-loss record in National Collegiate Athletic Association Division III history.
